title: Akshay Kumar:Akshay Kumar Proves To Be A Real Hero Yet Again, Donates Rs 1 Crore To 25 flood-Stricken Families In Bihar
text:
Akshay Kumar Proves To Be A Real Hero Yet Again, Donates Rs 1 Crore To 25 flood-Stricken Families In Bihar

Akshay Kumar Proves To Be A Real Hero Yet Again, Donates Rs 1 Crore To 25 flood-Stricken Families In Bihar

Akshay Kumar is a brand that keeps on reinventing himself with versatile projects every year. While he is often mocked for doing films on social causes, he proves all of them wrong by delivering a comedy-drama like Housefull 4. But these are not the only reasons why Khiladi Kumar is loved by people.

According to a report in some of the leading websites, Akshay has donated Rs 1 crore to rehabilitate 25 families that have affected by the floods in Bihar.

In the monetary help provided by Akshay, each family will be receiving Rs 4 lakhs to rehabilitate themselves and start their lives again.

Talking about his deed, Akshay said that natural calamities like these remind us that we are very small in front of the magnificent nature that possesses power to make or break lives. That's not all. In August, Akshay Kumar had donated Rs 1 crore each to the Assam Chief Minister’s Relief Fund, and for the rescue work in Kaziranga National Park.
